00048 
00049 //
00050 // DocListDiskBlockWriter
00051 // 
00052 // 9 January 2004 - tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_DOCLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_DOCLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/DocListDiskBlockReader.hpp"
00059 #include <indri/greedy_vector>
00060 
00061 // keep enough room for a new termID, new ending, new docID, new location count, new position
00062 #define INDRI_MAX_SINGLE_DOC_POSITION_SIZE (4+2+5*3)
00063 #define INDRI_MAX_POSITION_SIZE (5)
00064 
00065 namespace indri {
00066   namespace index {
00067     class DocListDiskBlockWriter {
00068       char _block[ INDRI_DOCLIST_BLOCKSIZE ];
00069       char* _data;
00070       char* _positionsSpot;
00071       int _positions;
00072       greedy_vector<UINT32> _termIDs;
00073       greedy_vector<UINT16> _endings;
00074 
00075       int _lastDocumentID;
00076       int _lastTermID;
00077       int _lastPosition;
00078     
00079     public:
00080       DocListDiskBlockWriter() {
00081         clear();
00082       }
00083 
00084     private:
00085       char* _beginMetadata() {
00086         size_t terms = _termIDs.size();
00087         size_t currentTermSize = terms * sizeof(UINT32);
00088         size_t currentEndingsSize = terms * sizeof(UINT16);
00089         size_t lastDocumentIDSize = sizeof(UINT32);
00090 
00091         return _block + INDRI_DOCLIST_BLOCKSIZE - (currentTermSize + currentEndingsSize + lastDocumentIDSize);
00092       }
00093 
00094       void _completeTerm() {
00095         // _addPositionsCount has to come before endings, because
00096         // _addPositionsCount may change the value of _data
00097         _addPositionsCount();
00098         _endings.push_back( (UINT16) (_data - _block) );
00099       }
00100 
00101       void _addPositionsCount() {
00102         assert( _positionsSpot );
00103         int compressedSize = RVLCompress::compressedSize( _positions );
00104 
00105         if( compressedSize > 1 ) {
00106           ::memmove( _positionsSpot + compressedSize, _positionsSpot + 1, _data - _positionsSpot - 1 );
00107           _data += compressedSize - 1;
00108         }
00109 
00110         RVLCompress::compress_int( _positionsSpot, _positions );
00111         _positions = 0;
00112         _positionsSpot = 0;
00113       }
00114 
00115       void _addTerm( int termID ) {
00116         if( _termIDs.size() ) {
00117           _completeTerm();
00118         }
00119 
00120         _termIDs.push_back( termID );
00121         _lastTermID = termID;
00122         _lastDocumentID = 0;
00123         _lastPosition = 0;
00124       }
00125 
00126       void _addDocument( int documentID ) {
00127         if( _positions ) {
00128           _addPositionsCount();
00129         }
00130 
00131         _data = RVLCompress::compress_int( _data, documentID - _lastDocumentID );
00132         _lastDocumentID = documentID;
00133         _lastPosition = 0;
00134 
00135         // leave one byte around for positions
00136         _positionsSpot = _data;
00137         _data += 1;
00138       }
00139 
00140       void _addPosition( int position ) {
00141         _data = RVLCompress::compress_int( _data, position - _lastPosition );
00142         _lastPosition = position;
00143         _positions++;
00144       }
00145 
00146     public:
00147       int addDocument( int termID, int documentID, const int* positions, int positionCount ) {
00148         int i;
00149 
00150         if( _beginMetadata() - _data < INDRI_MAX_SINGLE_DOC_POSITION_SIZE )
00151           return 0;
00152         
00153         if( termID != _lastTermID )
00154           _addTerm( termID );
00155       
00156         _addDocument( documentID );
00157 
00158         char* metadata = _beginMetadata();
00159 
00160         for( i=0; i<positionCount && metadata - _data > INDRI_MAX_POSITION_SIZE; i++ ) {
00161           _addPosition( positions[i] );
00162         }
00163         
00164         return i;
00165       }
00166 
00167       bool addPosition( int termID, int documentID, int position ) {
00168         if( _beginMetadata() - _data < INDRI_MAX_SINGLE_DOC_POSITION_SIZE )
00169           return false;
00170             
00171         if( termID != _lastTermID ) {
00172           _addTerm( termID );
00173         }
00174 
00175         if( documentID != _lastDocumentID ) {
00176           _addDocument( documentID );
00177         }
00178 
00179         _addPosition( position );
00180         return true;
00181       }
00182 
00183       void close() {
00184         //
00185         // This method adds all the metadata to the block and prepares
00186         // it for writing to disk.  The block format is as follows:
00187         //
00188         // Header:  2-byte termCount
00189         // Data:    Variable length section consisting of documentIDs and 
00190         //          locations, compressed
00191         // Void:    possibly some unused data space here
00192         // Footer:  4-byte last documentID
00193         //          (2 byte * termCount) endings -- the offsets into the
00194         //              data portion where the termID changes
00195         //          (4 byte * termCount) termIDs -- termIDs used in this
00196         //              block
00197 
00198         if( _positions ) {
00199           _completeTerm();
00200         }
00201 
00202         assert( _endings.size() == _termIDs.size() );
00203 
00204         // put a term count at the beginning of the block
00205         UINT16 termCount = UINT16(_termIDs.size());
00206         memcpy( _block, &termCount, sizeof(termCount) );
00207 
00208         char* endBlock = _block + sizeof(_block);
00209         char* startTermIDs = endBlock - sizeof(UINT32)*termCount;
00210         char* startEndings = startTermIDs - sizeof(UINT16)*termCount;
00211         char* startFinalDocID = startEndings - sizeof(UINT32);
00212 
00213         assert( startFinalDocID >= _data ); // term list data and end of block data shouldn't overlap
00214 
00215         // store the termID list at the end of the block
00216         memcpy( startTermIDs, &_termIDs.front(), termCount*sizeof(UINT32) );
00217 
00218         // store endings
00219         memcpy( startEndings, &_endings.front(), termCount*sizeof(UINT16) );
00220 
00221         // store final document ID
00222         memcpy( startFinalDocID, &_lastDocumentID, sizeof(UINT32) );
00223       }
00224 
00225       void clear() {
00226         _termIDs.clear();
00227         _endings.clear();
00228         _data = _block + sizeof(UINT16);
00229 
00230         _lastDocumentID = 0;
00231         _lastTermID = 0;
00232         _lastPosition = 0;
00233         _positions = 0;
00234         _positionsSpot = 0;
00235       }
00236 
00237       char* data() {
00238         return _block;
00239       }
00240 
00241       int dataSize() const {
00242         return INDRI_DOCLIST_BLOCKSIZE;
00243       }
00244     };
00245   }
00246 }
00247 
00248 #endif // INDRI_DOCLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
00249
